name: AficionaDAO
description: ADAO is a DAO exclusively for intellectuals, a collective brain. AficionaDAO. Where money talks & plebs don't moan. We are combining the exclusivity of an NFT collection with the liquidity of a token. A maximum buy? Not us. We have a minimum buy. We want a community that understands and respects how the market works, rather than screaming every time we see a small dip in price. Once live our holders will have their own token gated community, away from the riff raff which counts for an "investor" these days. AficionaDAO. Because in a world full of noise, silence is the real luxury. ADAO is designed to create a space where intelligent individuals can transact without distractions. We recognize the need for a filter in the blockchain community to reduce noise and focus on meaningful interactions.
